name: setLocale
description:
Sets the country/language locale for CFML processing
 and the page returned to the client. The locale value
 determines the default format of date, time, number, and
 currency values, according to language and regional
 conventions.

params.name: new_locale
params.description: The name of a locale; for example, "English (US)"

examples.title: Set Locale Script Example
examples.description: Outputs the current locale, Sets the locale to French (Belgian) and outputs it, then puts it back to the original and outputs it
examples.code:
currentLocale = getLocale(); writeOutput("Current: "); writeDump(currentLocale); writeOutput("
"); setLocale("French (Belgian)"); writeOutput("New: "); writeDump(getLocale()); writeOutput("
"); setLocale(currentLocale); writeOutput("Original: "); writeDump(getLocale());
